name: Run_scripts on Add to quote
action:
<* ExecuteScript(GS_Series_CG_CalculationTrigger) *>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_C300_Sys_Cabinets_Qty)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_CG_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_SerC_C300_CG_Parts_2)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_UMC_parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(SerC_CG_PowerSupply_Parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_UMC_parts)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_CG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_CG2)*>
<* ExecuteScript(C300_shipping_crate_parts_CG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_CG)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_mcar_part_add_CG2)*>
<* ExecuteScript(PS_Series_C_CG_Part_Summary_Cont_update_parts)*>
<*CTX( Container(Series_C_CG_Part_Summary_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(Series_C_CG_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber   ) )*>
